 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָתַח‎</span>] **verb** ==boil== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[Eccl.43.3|Eccl 43:3]] Hiph\`il ***make hot***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְתַח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***boil***); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַתַּח‎</span> causative [[Ezek.24.5|Ezek 24:5]] ***cause to boil***, bring to boiling, with accusative of thing. **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֻתְּחוּ‎</span> [[Job.30.27|Job 30:27]] my bowels ***have been made to boil*** without quiet (figurative of violent emotion). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְתִּיחַ כַּסּיר מְצוּלָה‎</span> [[Job.41.23|Job 41:23]] ***he*** (the crocodile) ***maketh the depth boil like the pot.***.
